it.polimi.ingsw.rmi

Interface ServerInterfaceRMI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerRMI

    public interface ServerInterfaceRMI
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Server Interface RMI This interface is used by the client to call the below listed methods of the server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptWindowPatternCard() 
      boolean checkAlreadyExistingUsername(java.lang.String usernameRequested)
      Method used to check if the usernameRequested is already picked or not
      void deregisterClient(ClientRMI clientRMI)
      Method used to deregister a client from the server
      Model getModelOfCurrentGame()
      Method to get the model in the current game from the client All the actions using this model will be precede by this method
      void getRequestFromClient(Request request, Player player) 
      boolean getWindowPatternFromPlayer(WindowPatternCard windowPatternCard, Player player)
      Method used to send from the client to the server the chosen window pattern card
      boolean registerClient(ClientInterfaceRMI clientInterfaceRMI, java.lang.String usernameRequested)
      Method used to register a client

    • Method Detail

      • registerClient

        boolean registerClient(ClientInterfaceRMI clientInterfaceRMI,
                       java.lang.String usernameRequested)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to register a client
        Parameters:
        clientInterfaceRMI - exported ClientInterfaceRMI from the ClientRMI
        usernameRequested - username chosen by the user
        Returns:
        a boolean to confirm the registration
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a registration error occurs

               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to deregister a client from the server
        Parameters:
        clientRMI - client to deregister
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a deregistration error occurs

                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to check if the usernameRequested is already picked or not
        Parameters:
        usernameRequested - username requested by the user
        Returns:
        a boolean for availability
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a Remote error occurs

      • getModelOfCurrentGame

        Model getModelOfCurrentGame()
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method to get the model in the current game from the client All the actions using this model will be precede by this method
        Returns:
        the model of th current game
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occures
